7364 ! lower limit of integration
7365 !
7366 ! b - real ( kind = 8 )
7367 ! upper limit of integration
7368 !
7369 ! on return
7370 ! result - real ( kind = 8 )
7371 ! approximation to the integral i
7372 ! result is computed by applying the 41-point
7373 ! gauss-kronrod rule (resk) obtained by optimal
7374 ! addition of abscissae to the 20-point gauss
7375 ! rule (resg).
7376 !
7377 ! abserr - real ( kind = 8 )
7378 ! estimate of the modulus of the absolute error,
7379 ! which should not exceed abs(i-result)
7380 !
7381 ! resabs - real ( kind = 8 )
7382 ! approximation to the integral j
7383 !
7384 ! resasc - real ( kind = 8 )
7385 ! approximation to the integal of abs(f-i/(b-a))
7386 ! over (a,b)
7387 !
7388 ! Local Parameters:
7389 !
7390 !
7391 ! the abscissae and weights are given for the interval (-1,1).
7392 ! because of symmetry only the positive abscissae and their
7393 ! corresponding weights are given.
7394 !
7395 ! xgk - abscissae of the 41-point gauss-kronrod rule
7396 ! xgk(2), xgk(4), ... abscissae of the 20-point
7397 ! gauss rule
7398 ! xgk(1), xgk(3), ... abscissae which are optimally
7399 ! added to the 20-point gauss rule
7400 !
7401 ! wgk - weights of the 41-point gauss-kronrod rule
7402 !
7403 ! wg - weights of the 20-point gauss rule
7404 !
7405 !
7406 ! gauss quadrature weights and kronron quadrature abscissae and weights
7407 ! as evaluated with 80 decimal digit arithmetic by l. w. fullerton,
7408 ! bell labs, nov. 1981.
7409 !
7410 ! centr - mid point of the interval
7411 ! hlgth - half-length of the interval
7412 ! absc - abscissa
7413 ! fval* - function value
7414 ! resg - result of the 20-point gauss formula
7415 ! resk - result of the 41-point kronrod formula
7416 ! reskh - approximation to mean value of f over (a,b), i.e.
7417 ! to i/(b-a)
7418 !
7419 ! machine dependent constants
7420 !
7421 ! epmach is the largest relative spacing.
7422 ! uflow is the smallest positive magnitude.
7423 !
7424  implicit none
7425 
7426  real ( kind = 8 ) a,absc,abserr,b,centr,dhlgth, &
7427  epmach,f,fc,fsum,fval1,fval2,fv1,fv2,hlgth,resabs,resasc, &
7428  resg,resk,reskh,result,uflow,wg,wgk,xgk
7429  integer ( kind = 4 ) j,jtw,jtwm1
7430  external f
7431 
7432  dimension fv1(20),fv2(20),xgk(21),wgk(21),wg(10)
7433 
7434  data wg( 1) / 0.017614007139152118311861962351853d0 /
7435  data wg( 2) / 0.040601429800386941331039952274932d0 /
7436  data wg( 3) / 0.062672048334109063569506535187042d0 /
7437  data wg( 4) / 0.083276741576704748724758143222046d0 /
7438  data wg( 5) / 0.101930119817240435036750135480350d0 /
7439  data wg( 6) / 0.118194531961518417312377377711382d0 /
7440  data wg( 7) / 0.131688638449176626898494499748163d0 /
7441  data wg( 8) / 0.142096109318382051329298325067165d0 /
7442  data wg( 9) / 0.149172986472603746787828737001969d0 /
7443  data wg( 10) / 0.152753387130725850698084331955098d0 /
7444 
7445  data xgk( 1) / 0.998859031588277663838315576545863d0 /
7446  data xgk( 2) / 0.993128599185094924786122388471320d0 /
7447  data xgk( 3) / 0.981507877450250259193342994720217d0 /
7448  data xgk( 4) / 0.963971927277913791267666131197277d0 /
7449  data xgk( 5) / 0.940822633831754753519982722212443d0 /
7450  data xgk( 6) / 0.912234428251325905867752441203298d0 /
7451  data xgk( 7) / 0.878276811252281976077442995113078d0 /
7452  data xgk( 8) / 0.839116971822218823394529061701521d0 /
7453  data xgk( 9) / 0.795041428837551198350638833272788d0 /
7454  data xgk( 10) / 0.746331906460150792614305070355642d0 /
7455  data xgk( 11) / 0.693237656334751384805490711845932d0 /
7456  data xgk( 12) / 0.636053680726515025452836696226286d0 /
7457  data xgk( 13) / 0.575140446819710315342946036586425d0 /
7458  data xgk( 14) / 0.510867001950827098004364050955251d0 /
7459  data xgk( 15) / 0.443593175238725103199992213492640d0 /
7460  data xgk( 16) / 0.373706088715419560672548177024927d0 /
7461  data xgk( 17) / 0.301627868114913004320555356858592d0 /
7462  data xgk( 18) / 0.227785851141645078080496195368575d0 /
7463  data xgk( 19) / 0.152605465240922675505220241022678d0 /
7464  data xgk( 20) / 0.076526521133497333754640409398838d0 /
7465  data xgk( 21) / 0.000000000000000000000000000000000d0 /
7466 
7467  data wgk( 1) / 0.003073583718520531501218293246031d0 /
7468  data wgk( 2) / 0.008600269855642942198661787950102d0 /
7469  data wgk( 3) / 0.014626169256971252983787960308868d0 /
7470  data wgk( 4) / 0.020388373461266523598010231432755d0 /
7471  data wgk( 5) / 0.025882133604951158834505067096153d0 /
7472  data wgk( 6) / 0.031287306777032798958543119323801d0 /
7473  data wgk( 7) / 0.036600169758200798030557240707211d0 /
7474  data wgk( 8) / 0.041668873327973686263788305936895d0 /
7475  data wgk( 9) / 0.046434821867497674720231880926108d0 /
7476  data wgk( 10) / 0.050944573923728691932707670050345d0 /
7477  data wgk( 11) / 0.055195105348285994744832372419777d0 /
7478  data wgk( 12) / 0.059111400880639572374967220648594d0 /
7479  data wgk( 13) / 0.062653237554781168025870122174255d0 /
7480  data wgk( 14) / 0.065834597133618422111563556969398d0 /
7481  data wgk( 15) / 0.068648672928521619345623411885368d0 /
7482  data wgk( 16) / 0.071054423553444068305790361723210d0 /
7483  data wgk( 17) / 0.073030690332786667495189417658913d0 /
7484  data wgk( 18) / 0.074582875400499188986581418362488d0 /
7485  data wgk( 19) / 0.075704497684556674659542775376617d0 /
7486  data wgk( 20) / 0.076377867672080736705502835038061d0 /
7487  data wgk( 21) / 0.076600711917999656445049901530102d0 /
7488 
7489  epmach = epsilon( epmach )
7490  uflow = tiny( uflow )
7491  centr = 0.5d+00*(a+b)
7492  hlgth = 0.5d+00*(b-a)
7493  dhlgth = abs( hlgth)
7494 !
7495 ! compute the 41-point gauss-kronrod approximation to
7496 ! the integral, and estimate the absolute error.
7497 !
7498  resg = 0.0d+00
7499  fc = f(centr)
7500  resk = wgk(21)*fc
7501  resabs = abs( resk)
7502 
7503  do j=1,10
7504  jtw = j*2
7505  absc = hlgth*xgk(jtw)
7506  fval1 = f(centr-absc)
7507  fval2 = f(centr+absc)
7508  fv1(jtw) = fval1
7509  fv2(jtw) = fval2
7510  fsum = fval1+fval2
7511  resg = resg+wg(j)*fsum
7512  resk = resk+wgk(jtw)*fsum
7513  resabs = resabs+wgk(jtw)*( abs( fval1)+ abs( fval2))
7514  end do
7515 
7516  do j = 1,10
7517  jtwm1 = j*2-1
7518  absc = hlgth*xgk(jtwm1)
7519  fval1 = f(centr-absc)
7520  fval2 = f(centr+absc)
7521  fv1(jtwm1) = fval1
7522  fv2(jtwm1) = fval2
7523  fsum = fval1+fval2
7524  resk = resk+wgk(jtwm1)*fsum
7525  resabs = resabs+wgk(jtwm1)*( abs( fval1)+ abs( fval2))
7526  end do
7527 
7528  reskh = resk*0.5d+00
7529  resasc = wgk(21)* abs( fc-reskh)
7530 
7531  do j=1,20
7532  resasc = resasc+wgk(j)*( abs( fv1(j)-reskh)+ abs( fv2(j)-reskh))
7533  end do
7534 
7535  result = resk*hlgth
7536  resabs = resabs*dhlgth
7537  resasc = resasc*dhlgth
7538  abserr = abs( (resk-resg)*hlgth)
7539  if(resasc.ne.0.0d+00.and.abserr.ne.0.d+00) &
7540  abserr = resasc* min(0.1d+01,(0.2d+03*abserr/resasc)**1.5d+00)
7541  if(resabs.gt.uflow/(0.5d+02*epmach)) abserr = max &
7542  ((epmach*0.5d+02)*resabs,abserr)
7543 
7544  return
7545 end
7546 subroutine dqk51(f,a,b,result,abserr,resabs,resasc)
7547 
7548 !*****************************************************************************80
7549 !
7550 !! DQK51 carries out a 51 point Gauss-Kronrod quadrature rule.
7551 !
7552 ! Modified:
7553 !
7554 ! 11 September 2015
7555 !
7556 ! Author:
7557 !
7558 ! Robert Piessens, Elise de Doncker
7559 !
7560 !***purpose to compute i = integral of f over (a,b) with error
7561 ! estimate
7562 ! j = integral of abs(f) over (a,b)
7563 !
7564 ! Parameters:
7565 !
7566 ! on entry
7567 ! f - real ( kind = 8 )
7568 ! function defining the integrand
7569 ! function f(x). the actual name for f needs to be
7570 ! declared e x t e r n a l in the calling program.
7571 !
7572 ! a - real ( kind = 8 )
7573 ! lower limit of integration
7574 !
7575 ! b - real ( kind = 8 )
7576 ! upper limit of integration
7577 !
7578 ! on return
7579 ! result - real ( kind = 8 )
7580 ! approximation to the integral i
7581 ! result is computed by applying the 51-point
7582 ! kronrod rule (resk) obtained by optimal addition
7583 ! of abscissae to the 25-point gauss rule (resg).
7584 !
7585 ! abserr - real ( kind = 8 )
7586 ! estimate of the modulus of the absolute error,
7587 ! which should not exceed abs(i-result)
7588 !
7589 ! resabs - real ( kind = 8 )
7590 ! approximation to the integral j
7591 !
7592 ! resasc - real ( kind = 8 )
7593 ! approximation to the integral of abs(f-i/(b-a))
7594 ! over (a,b)
7595 !
7596 ! Local Parameters:
7597 !
7598 ! the abscissae and weights are given for the interval (-1,1).
7599 ! because of symmetry only the positive abscissae and their
7600 ! corresponding weights are given.
7601 !
7602 ! xgk - abscissae of the 51-point kronrod rule
7603 ! xgk(2), xgk(4), ... abscissae of the 25-point
7604 ! gauss rule
7605 ! xgk(1), xgk(3), ... abscissae which are optimally
7606 ! added to the 25-point gauss rule
7607 !
7608 ! wgk - weights of the 51-point kronrod rule
7609 !
7610 ! wg - weights of the 25-point gauss rule
7611 !
7612 ! gauss quadrature weights and kronron quadrature abscissae and weights
7613 ! as evaluated with 80 decimal digit arithmetic by l. w. fullerton,
7614 ! bell labs, nov. 1981.
7615 !
7616 ! centr - mid point of the interval
7617 ! hlgth - half-length of the interval
7618 ! absc - abscissa
7619 ! fval* - function value
7620 ! resg - result of the 25-point gauss formula
7621 ! resk - result of the 51-point kronrod formula
7622 ! reskh - approximation to the mean value of f over (a,b),
7623 ! i.e. to i/(b-a)
7624 !
7625 ! machine dependent constants
7626 !
7627 ! epmach is the largest relative spacing.
7628 ! uflow is the smallest positive magnitude.
7629 !
7630  implicit none
7631 
7632  real ( kind = 8 ) a,absc,abserr,b,centr,dhlgth, &
7633  epmach,f,fc,fsum,fval1,fval2,fv1,fv2,hlgth,resabs,resasc, &
7634  resg,resk,reskh,result,uflow,wg,wgk,xgk
7635  integer ( kind = 4 ) j,jtw,jtwm1
7636  external f
7637 
7638  dimension fv1(25),fv2(25),xgk(26),wgk(26),wg(13)
7639 
7640  data wg( 1) / 0.011393798501026287947902964113235d0 /
7641  data wg( 2) / 0.026354986615032137261901815295299d0 /
7642  data wg( 3) / 0.040939156701306312655623487711646d0 /
7643  data wg( 4) / 0.054904695975835191925936891540473d0 /
7644  data wg( 5) / 0.068038333812356917207187185656708d0 /
7645  data wg( 6) / 0.080140700335001018013234959669111d0 /
7646  data wg( 7) / 0.091028261982963649811497220702892d0 /
7647  data wg( 8) / 0.100535949067050644202206890392686d0 /
7648  data wg( 9) / 0.108519624474263653116093957050117d0 /
7649  data wg( 10) / 0.114858259145711648339325545869556d0 /
7650  data wg( 11) / 0.119455763535784772228178126512901d0 /
7651  data wg( 12) / 0.122242442990310041688959518945852d0 /
7652  data wg( 13) / 0.123176053726715451203902873079050d0 /
7653 
7654  data xgk( 1) / 0.999262104992609834193457486540341d0 /
7655  data xgk( 2) / 0.995556969790498097908784946893902d0 /
7656  data xgk( 3) / 0.988035794534077247637331014577406d0 /
7657  data xgk( 4) / 0.976663921459517511498315386479594d0 /
7658  data xgk( 5) / 0.961614986425842512418130033660167d0 /
7659  data xgk( 6) / 0.942974571228974339414011169658471d0 /
7660  data xgk( 7) / 0.920747115281701561746346084546331d0 /
7661  data xgk( 8) / 0.894991997878275368851042006782805d0 /
7662  data xgk( 9) / 0.865847065293275595448996969588340d0 /
7663  data xgk( 10) / 0.833442628760834001421021108693570d0 /
7664  data xgk( 11) / 0.797873797998500059410410904994307d0 /
7665  data xgk( 12) / 0.759259263037357630577282865204361d0 /
7666  data xgk( 13) / 0.717766406813084388186654079773298d0 /
7667  data xgk( 14) / 0.673566368473468364485120633247622d0 /
7668  data xgk( 15) / 0.626810099010317412788122681624518d0 /
7669  data xgk( 16) / 0.577662930241222967723689841612654d0 /
7670  data xgk( 17) / 0.526325284334719182599623778158010d0 /
7671  data xgk( 18) / 0.473002731445714960522182115009192d0 /
7672  data xgk( 19) / 0.417885382193037748851814394594572d0 /
7673  data xgk( 20) / 0.361172305809387837735821730127641d0 /
7674  data xgk( 21) / 0.303089538931107830167478909980339d0 /
7675  data xgk( 22) / 0.243866883720988432045190362797452d0 /
7676  data xgk( 23) / 0.183718939421048892015969888759528d0 /
7677  data xgk( 24) / 0.122864692610710396387359818808037d0 /
7678  data xgk( 25) / 0.061544483005685078886546392366797d0 /
7679  data xgk( 26) / 0.000000000000000000000000000000000d0 /
7680 
7681  data wgk( 1) / 0.001987383892330315926507851882843d0 /
7682  data wgk( 2) / 0.005561932135356713758040236901066d0 /
7683  data wgk( 3) / 0.009473973386174151607207710523655d0 /
7684  data wgk( 4) / 0.013236229195571674813656405846976d0 /
7685  data wgk( 5) / 0.016847817709128298231516667536336d0 /
7686  data wgk( 6) / 0.020435371145882835456568292235939d0 /
7687  data wgk( 7) / 0.024009945606953216220092489164881d0 /
7688  data wgk( 8) / 0.027475317587851737802948455517811d0 /
7689  data wgk( 9) / 0.030792300167387488891109020215229d0 /
7690  data wgk( 10) / 0.034002130274329337836748795229551d0 /
7691  data wgk( 11) / 0.037116271483415543560330625367620d0 /
7692  data wgk( 12) / 0.040083825504032382074839284467076d0 /
7693  data wgk( 13) / 0.042872845020170049476895792439495d0 /
7694  data wgk( 14) / 0.045502913049921788909870584752660d0 /
7695  data wgk( 15) / 0.047982537138836713906392255756915d0 /
7696  data wgk( 16) / 0.050277679080715671963325259433440d0 /
7697  data wgk( 17) / 0.052362885806407475864366712137873d0 /
7698  data wgk( 18) / 0.054251129888545490144543370459876d0 /
7699  data wgk( 19) / 0.055950811220412317308240686382747d0 /
7700  data wgk( 20) / 0.057437116361567832853582693939506d0 /
7701  data wgk( 21) / 0.058689680022394207961974175856788d0 /
7702  data wgk( 22) / 0.059720340324174059979099291932562d0 /
7703  data wgk( 23) / 0.060539455376045862945360267517565d0 /
7704  data wgk( 24) / 0.061128509717053048305859030416293d0 /
7705  data wgk( 25) / 0.061471189871425316661544131965264d0 /
7706  data wgk( 26) / 0.061580818067832935078759824240066d0 /
7707 
7708  epmach = epsilon( epmach )
7709  uflow = tiny( uflow )
7710  centr = 0.5d+00*(a+b)
7711  hlgth = 0.5d+00*(b-a)
7712  dhlgth = abs( hlgth)
7713 !
7714 ! compute the 51-point kronrod approximation to
7715 ! the integral, and estimate the absolute error.
7716 !
7717  fc = f(centr)
7718  resg = wg(13)*fc
7719  resk = wgk(26)*fc
7720  resabs = abs( resk)
7721 
7722  do j=1,12
7723  jtw = j*2
7724  absc = hlgth*xgk(jtw)
7725  fval1 = f(centr-absc)
7726  fval2 = f(centr+absc)
7727  fv1(jtw) = fval1
7728  fv2(jtw) = fval2
7729  fsum = fval1+fval2
7730  resg = resg+wg(j)*fsum
7731  resk = resk+wgk(jtw)*fsum
7732  resabs = resabs+wgk(jtw)*( abs( fval1)+ abs( fval2))
7733  end do
7734 
7735  do j = 1,13
7736  jtwm1 = j*2-1
7737  absc = hlgth*xgk(jtwm1)
7738  fval1 = f(centr-absc)
7739  fval2 = f(centr+absc)
7740  fv1(jtwm1) = fval1
7741  fv2(jtwm1) = fval2
7742  fsum = fval1+fval2
7743  resk = resk+wgk(jtwm1)*fsum
7744  resabs = resabs+wgk(jtwm1)*( abs( fval1)+ abs( fval2))
7745  end do
7746 
7747  reskh = resk*0.5d+00
7748  resasc = wgk(26)* abs( fc-reskh)
7749 
7750  do j=1,25
7751  resasc = resasc+wgk(j)*( abs( fv1(j)-reskh)+ abs( fv2(j)-reskh))
7752  end do
7753 
7754  result = resk*hlgth
7755  resabs = resabs*dhlgth
7756  resasc = resasc*dhlgth
7757  abserr = abs( (resk-resg)*hlgth)
7758  if(resasc.ne.0.0d+00.and.abserr.ne.0.0d+00) &
7759  abserr = resasc* min(0.1d+01,(0.2d+03*abserr/resasc)**1.5d+00)
7760  if(resabs.gt.uflow/(0.5d+02*epmach)) abserr = max &
7761  ((epmach*0.5d+02)*resabs,abserr)
7762 
7763  return
7764 end
7765 subroutine dqk61(f,a,b,result,abserr,resabs,resasc)
7766 
7767 !*****************************************************************************80
7768 !
7769 !! DQK61 carries out a 61 point Gauss-Kronrod quadrature rule.
7770 !
7771 ! Modified:
7772 !
7773 ! 11 September 2015
7774 !
7775 ! Author:
7776 !
7777 ! Robert Piessens, Elise de Doncker
7778 !
7779 !***purpose to compute i = integral of f over (a,b) with error
7780 ! estimate
7781 ! j = integral of abs ( f) over (a,b)
7782 !
7783 ! Parameters:
7784 !
7785 ! on entry
7786 ! f - real ( kind = 8 )
7787 ! function subprogram defining the integrand
7788 ! function f(x). the actual name for f needs to be
7789 ! declared e x t e r n a l in the calling program.
7790 !
7791 ! a - real ( kind = 8 )
7792 ! lower limit of integration
7793 !
7794 ! b - real ( kind = 8 )
7795 ! upper limit of integration
7796 !
7797 ! on return
7798 ! result - real ( kind = 8 )
7799 ! approximation to the integral i
7800 ! result is computed by applying the 61-point
7801 ! kronrod rule (resk) obtained by optimal addition of
7802 ! abscissae to the 30-point gauss rule (resg).
7803 !
7804 ! abserr - real ( kind = 8 )
7805 ! estimate of the modulus of the absolute error,
7806 ! which should equal or exceed abs ( i-result)
7807 !
7808 ! resabs - real ( kind = 8 )
7809 ! approximation to the integral j
7810 !
7811 ! resasc - real ( kind = 8 )
7812 ! approximation to the integral of abs ( f-i/(b-a))
7813 !
7814 ! Local Parameters:
7815 !
7816 ! the abscissae and weights are given for the
7817 ! interval (-1,1). because of symmetry only the positive
7818 ! abscissae and their corresponding weights are given.
7819 !
7820 ! xgk - abscissae of the 61-point kronrod rule
7821 ! xgk(2), xgk(4) ... abscissae of the 30-point
7822 ! gauss rule
7823 ! xgk(1), xgk(3) ... optimally added abscissae
7824 ! to the 30-point gauss rule
7825 !
7826 ! wgk - weights of the 61-point kronrod rule
7827 !
7828 ! wg - weigths of the 30-point gauss rule
7829 !
7830 !
7831 ! gauss quadrature weights and kronron quadrature abscissae and weights
7832 ! as evaluated with 80 decimal digit arithmetic by l. w. fullerton,
7833 ! bell labs, nov. 1981.
7834 !
7835 ! centr - mid point of the interval
7836 ! hlgth - half-length of the interval
7837 ! dabsc - abscissa
7838 ! fval* - function value
7839 ! resg - result of the 30-point gauss rule
7840 ! resk - result of the 61-point kronrod rule
7841 ! reskh - approximation to the mean value of f
7842 ! over (a,b), i.e. to i/(b-a)
7843 !
7844 ! machine dependent constants
7845 !
7846 ! epmach is the largest relative spacing.
7847 ! uflow is the smallest positive magnitude.
7848 !
7849  implicit none
7850 
7851  real ( kind = 8 ) a,dabsc,abserr,b,centr,dhlgth, &
7852  epmach,f,fc,fsum,fval1,fval2,fv1,fv2,hlgth,resabs,resasc, &
7853  resg,resk,reskh,result,uflow,wg,wgk,xgk
7854  integer ( kind = 4 ) j,jtw,jtwm1
7855  external f
7856 
7857  dimension fv1(30),fv2(30),xgk(31),wgk(31),wg(15)
7858 
7859  data wg( 1) / 0.007968192496166605615465883474674d0 /
7860  data wg( 2) / 0.018466468311090959142302131912047d0 /
7861  data wg( 3) / 0.028784707883323369349719179611292d0 /
7862  data wg( 4) / 0.038799192569627049596801936446348d0 /
7863  data wg( 5) / 0.048402672830594052902938140422808d0 /
7864  data wg( 6) / 0.057493156217619066481721689402056d0 /
7865  data wg( 7) / 0.065974229882180495128128515115962d0 /
7866  data wg( 8) / 0.073755974737705206268243850022191d0 /
7867  data wg( 9) / 0.080755895229420215354694938460530d0 /
7868  data wg( 10) / 0.086899787201082979802387530715126d0 /
7869  data wg( 11) / 0.092122522237786128717632707087619d0 /
7870  data wg( 12) / 0.096368737174644259639468626351810d0 /
7871  data wg( 13) / 0.099593420586795267062780282103569d0 /
7872  data wg( 14) / 0.101762389748405504596428952168554d0 /
7873  data wg( 15) / 0.102852652893558840341285636705415d0 /
7874 
7875  data xgk( 1) / 0.999484410050490637571325895705811d0 /
7876  data xgk( 2) / 0.996893484074649540271630050918695d0 /
7877  data xgk( 3) / 0.991630996870404594858628366109486d0 /
7878  data xgk( 4) / 0.983668123279747209970032581605663d0 /
7879  data xgk( 5) / 0.973116322501126268374693868423707d0 /
7880  data xgk( 6) / 0.960021864968307512216871025581798d0 /
7881  data xgk( 7) / 0.944374444748559979415831324037439d0 /
7882  data xgk( 8) / 0.926200047429274325879324277080474d0 /
7883  data xgk( 9) / 0.905573307699907798546522558925958d0 /
7884  data xgk( 10) / 0.882560535792052681543116462530226d0 /
7885  data xgk( 11) / 0.857205233546061098958658510658944d0 /
7886  data xgk( 12) / 0.829565762382768397442898119732502d0 /
7887  data xgk( 13) / 0.799727835821839083013668942322683d0 /
7888  data xgk( 14) / 0.767777432104826194917977340974503d0 /
7889  data xgk( 15) / 0.733790062453226804726171131369528d0 /
7890  data xgk( 16) / 0.697850494793315796932292388026640d0 /
7891  data xgk( 17) / 0.660061064126626961370053668149271d0 /
7892  data xgk( 18) / 0.620526182989242861140477556431189d0 /
7893  data xgk( 19) / 0.579345235826361691756024932172540d0 /
7894  data xgk( 20) / 0.536624148142019899264169793311073d0 /
7895  data xgk( 21) / 0.492480467861778574993693061207709d0 /
7896  data xgk( 22) / 0.447033769538089176780609900322854d0 /
7897  data xgk( 23) / 0.400401254830394392535476211542661d0 /
7898  data xgk( 24) / 0.352704725530878113471037207089374d0 /
7899  data xgk( 25) / 0.304073202273625077372677107199257d0 /
7900  data xgk( 26) / 0.254636926167889846439805129817805d0 /
7901  data xgk( 27) / 0.204525116682309891438957671002025d0 /
7902  data xgk( 28) / 0.153869913608583546963794672743256d0 /
7903  data xgk( 29) / 0.102806937966737030147096751318001d0 /
7904  data xgk( 30) / 0.051471842555317695833025213166723d0 /
7905  data xgk( 31) / 0.000000000000000000000000000000000d0 /
7906 
7907  data wgk( 1) / 0.001389013698677007624551591226760d0 /
7908  data wgk( 2) / 0.003890461127099884051267201844516d0 /
7909  data wgk( 3) / 0.006630703915931292173319826369750d0 /
7910  data wgk( 4) / 0.009273279659517763428441146892024d0 /
7911  data wgk( 5) / 0.011823015253496341742232898853251d0 /
7912  data wgk( 6) / 0.014369729507045804812451432443580d0 /
7913  data wgk( 7) / 0.016920889189053272627572289420322d0 /
7914  data wgk( 8) / 0.019414141193942381173408951050128d0 /
7915  data wgk( 9) / 0.021828035821609192297167485738339d0 /
7916  data wgk( 10) / 0.024191162078080601365686370725232d0 /
7917  data wgk( 11) / 0.026509954882333101610601709335075d0 /
7918  data wgk( 12) / 0.028754048765041292843978785354334d0 /
7919  data wgk( 13) / 0.030907257562387762472884252943092d0 /
7920  data wgk( 14) / 0.032981447057483726031814191016854d0 /
7921  data wgk( 15) / 0.034979338028060024137499670731468d0 /
7922  data wgk( 16) / 0.036882364651821229223911065617136d0 /
7923  data wgk( 17) / 0.038678945624727592950348651532281d0 /
7924  data wgk( 18) / 0.040374538951535959111995279752468d0 /
7925  data wgk( 19) / 0.041969810215164246147147541285970d0 /
7926  data wgk( 20) / 0.043452539701356069316831728117073d0 /
7927  data wgk( 21) / 0.044814800133162663192355551616723d0 /
7928  data wgk( 22) / 0.046059238271006988116271735559374d0 /
7929  data wgk( 23) / 0.047185546569299153945261478181099d0 /
7930  data wgk( 24) / 0.048185861757087129140779492298305d0 /
7931  data wgk( 25) / 0.049055434555029778887528165367238d0 /
7932  data wgk( 26) / 0.049795683427074206357811569379942d0 /
7933  data wgk( 27) / 0.050405921402782346840893085653585d0 /
7934  data wgk( 28) / 0.050881795898749606492297473049805d0 /
7935  data wgk( 29) / 0.051221547849258772170656282604944d0 /
7936  data wgk( 30) / 0.051426128537459025933862879215781d0 /
7937  data wgk( 31) / 0.051494729429451567558340433647099d0 /
7938 
7939  epmach = epsilon( epmach )
7940  uflow = tiny( uflow )
7941  centr = 0.5d+00*(b+a)
7942  hlgth = 0.5d+00*(b-a)
7943  dhlgth = abs( hlgth)
7944 !
7945 ! compute the 61-point kronrod approximation to the
7946 ! integral, and estimate the absolute error.
7947 !
7948  resg = 0.0d+00
7949  fc = f(centr)
7950  resk = wgk(31)*fc
7951  resabs = abs( resk)
7952 
7953  do j=1,15
7954  jtw = j*2
7955  dabsc = hlgth*xgk(jtw)
7956  fval1 = f(centr-dabsc)
7957  fval2 = f(centr+dabsc)
7958  fv1(jtw) = fval1
7959  fv2(jtw) = fval2
7960  fsum = fval1+fval2
7961  resg = resg+wg(j)*fsum
7962  resk = resk+wgk(jtw)*fsum
7963  resabs = resabs+wgk(jtw)*( abs( fval1)+ abs( fval2))
7964  end do
7965 
7966  do j=1,15
7967  jtwm1 = j*2-1
7968  dabsc = hlgth*xgk(jtwm1)
7969  fval1 = f(centr-dabsc)
7970  fval2 = f(centr+dabsc)
7971  fv1(jtwm1) = fval1
7972  fv2(jtwm1) = fval2
7973  fsum = fval1+fval2
7974  resk = resk+wgk(jtwm1)*fsum
7975  resabs = resabs+wgk(jtwm1)*( abs( fval1)+ abs( fval2))
7976  end do
7977 
7978  reskh = resk*0.5d+00
7979  resasc = wgk(31)* abs( fc-reskh)
7980 
7981  do j=1,30
7982  resasc = resasc+wgk(j)*( abs( fv1(j)-reskh)+ abs( fv2(j)-reskh))
7983  end do
7984 
7985  result = resk*hlgth
7986  resabs = resabs*dhlgth
7987  resasc = resasc*dhlgth
7988  abserr = abs( (resk-resg)*hlgth)
7989  if(resasc.ne.0.0d+00.and.abserr.ne.0.0d+00) &
7990  abserr = resasc* min(0.1d+01,(0.2d+03*abserr/resasc)**1.5d+00)
7991  if(resabs.gt.uflow/(0.5d+02*epmach)) abserr = max &
7992  ((epmach*0.5d+02)*resabs,abserr)
7993 
7994  return
7995 end
7996 subroutine dqmomo(alfa,beta,ri,rj,rg,rh,integr)
7997 
7998 !*****************************************************************************80
7999 !
8000 !! DQMOMO computes modified Chebyshev moments.
8001 !
8002 ! Modified:
8003 !
8004 ! 11 September 2015
8005 !
8006 ! Author:
8007 !
8008 ! Robert Piessens, Elise de Doncker
8009 !
8010 !***purpose this routine computes modified chebsyshev moments. the k-th
8011 ! modified chebyshev moment is defined as the integral over
8012 ! (-1,1) of w(x)*t(k,x), where t(k,x) is the chebyshev
8013 ! polynomial of degree k.
8014 !
8015 ! Parameters:
8016 !
8017 ! alfa - real ( kind = 8 )
8018 ! parameter in the weight function w(x), alfa.gt.(-1)
8019 !
8020 ! beta - real ( kind = 8 )
8021 ! parameter in the weight function w(x), beta.gt.(-1)
8022 !
8023 ! ri - real ( kind = 8 )
8024 ! vector of dimension 25
8025 ! ri(k) is the integral over (-1,1) of
8026 ! (1+x)**alfa*t(k-1,x), k = 1, ..., 25.
8027 !
8028 ! rj - real ( kind = 8 )
8029 ! vector of dimension 25
8030 ! rj(k) is the integral over (-1,1) of
8031 ! (1-x)**beta*t(k-1,x), k = 1, ..., 25.
8032 !
8033 ! rg - real ( kind = 8 )
8034 ! vector of dimension 25
8035 ! rg(k) is the integral over (-1,1) of
8036 ! (1+x)**alfa*log((1+x)/2)*t(k-1,x), k = 1, ..., 25.
8037 !
8038 ! rh - real ( kind = 8 )
8039 ! vector of dimension 25
8040 ! rh(k) is the integral over (-1,1) of
8041 ! (1-x)**beta*log((1-x)/2)*t(k-1,x), k = 1, ..., 25.
8042 !
8043 ! integr - integer ( kind = 4 )
8044 ! input parameter indicating the modified
8045 ! moments to be computed
8046 ! integr = 1 compute ri, rj
8047 ! = 2 compute ri, rj, rg
8048 ! = 3 compute ri, rj, rh
8049 ! = 4 compute ri, rj, rg, rh
8050 !
8051  implicit none
8052 
8053  real ( kind = 8 ) alfa,alfp1,alfp2,an,anm1,beta,betp1,betp2,ralf, &
8054  rbet,rg,rh,ri,rj
8055  integer ( kind = 4 ) i,im1,integr
8056  dimension rg(25),rh(25),ri(25),rj(25)
8057 
8058  alfp1 = alfa+0.1d+01
8059  betp1 = beta+0.1d+01
8060  alfp2 = alfa+0.2d+01
8061  betp2 = beta+0.2d+01
8062  ralf = 0.2d+01**alfp1
8063  rbet = 0.2d+01**betp1
8064 !
8065 ! compute ri, rj using a forward recurrence relation.
8066 !
8067  ri(1) = ralf/alfp1
8068  rj(1) = rbet/betp1
8069  ri(2) = ri(1)*alfa/alfp2
8070  rj(2) = rj(1)*beta/betp2
8071  an = 0.2d+01
8072  anm1 = 0.1d+01
8073 
8074  do i=3,25
8075  ri(i) = -(ralf+an*(an-alfp2)*ri(i-1))/(anm1*(an+alfp1))
8076  rj(i) = -(rbet+an*(an-betp2)*rj(i-1))/(anm1*(an+betp1))
8077  anm1 = an
8078  an = an+0.1d+01
8079  end do
8080 
8081  if(integr.eq.1) go to 70
8082  if(integr.eq.3) go to 40
8083 !
8084 ! compute rg using a forward recurrence relation.
8085 !
8086  rg(1) = -ri(1)/alfp1
8087  rg(2) = -(ralf+ralf)/(alfp2*alfp2)-rg(1)
8088  an = 0.2d+01
8089  anm1 = 0.1d+01
8090  im1 = 2
8091 
8092  do i=3,25
8093  rg(i) = -(an*(an-alfp2)*rg(im1)-an*ri(im1)+anm1*ri(i))/ &
8094  (anm1*(an+alfp1))
8095  anm1 = an
8096  an = an+0.1d+01
8097  im1 = i
8098  end do
8099 
8100  if(integr.eq.2) go to 70
8101 !
8102 ! compute rh using a forward recurrence relation.
8103 !
8104  40 rh(1) = -rj(1)/betp1
8105  rh(2) = -(rbet+rbet)/(betp2*betp2)-rh(1)
8106  an = 0.2d+01
8107  anm1 = 0.1d+01
8108  im1 = 2
8109 
8110  do i=3,25
8111  rh(i) = -(an*(an-betp2)*rh(im1)-an*rj(im1)+ &
8112  anm1*rj(i))/(anm1*(an+betp1))
8113  anm1 = an
8114  an = an+0.1d+01
8115  im1 = i
8116  end do
8117 
8118  do i=2,25,2
8119  rh(i) = -rh(i)
8120  end do
8121 
8122  70 continue
8123 
8124  do i=2,25,2
8125  rj(i) = -rj(i)
8126  end do
8127 
8128  90 continue
8129 
8130  return
8131 end
8132 subroutine dqng ( f, a, b, epsabs, epsrel, result, abserr, neval, ier )
8133 
8134 !*****************************************************************************80
8135 !
8136 !! DQNG estimates an integral, using non-adaptive integration.
8137 !
8138 ! Modified:
8139 !
8140 ! 11 September 2015
8141 !
8142 ! Author:
8143 !
8144 ! Robert Piessens, Elise de Doncker
8145 !
8146 !***purpose the routine calculates an approximation result to a
8147 ! given definite integral i = integral of f over (a,b),
8148 ! hopefully satisfying following claim for accuracy
8149 ! abs(i-result).le.max(epsabs,epsrel*abs(i)).
8150 !
8151 ! Parameters:
8152 !
8153 ! f - real ( kind = 8 )
8154 ! function subprogram defining the integrand function
8155 ! f(x). the actual name for f needs to be declared
8156 ! e x t e r n a l in the driver program.
8157 !
8158 ! a - real ( kind = 8 )
8159 ! lower limit of integration
8160 !
8161 ! b - real ( kind = 8 )
8162 ! upper limit of integration
8163 !
8164 ! epsabs - real ( kind = 8 )
8165 ! absolute accuracy requested
8166 ! epsrel - real ( kind = 8 )
8167 ! relative accuracy requested
8168 ! if epsabs.le.0
8169 ! and epsrel.lt.max(50*rel.mach.acc.,0.5d-28),
8170 ! the routine will end with ier = 6.
8171 !
8172 ! on return
8173 ! result - real ( kind = 8 )
8174 ! approximation to the integral i
8175 ! result is obtained by applying the 21-point
8176 ! gauss-kronrod rule (res21) obtained by optimal
8177 ! addition of abscissae to the 10-point gauss rule
8178 ! (res10), or by applying the 43-point rule (res43)
8179 ! obtained by optimal addition of abscissae to the
8180 ! 21-point gauss-kronrod rule, or by applying the
8181 ! 87-point rule (res87) obtained by optimal addition
8182 ! of abscissae to the 43-point rule.
8183 !
8184 ! abserr - real ( kind = 8 )
8185 ! estimate of the modulus of the absolute error,
8186 ! which should equal or exceed abs(i-result)
8187 !
8188 ! neval - integer ( kind = 4 )
8189 ! number of integrand evaluations
8190 !
8191 ! ier - ier = 0 normal and reliable termination of the
8192 ! routine. it is assumed that the requested
8193 ! accuracy has been achieved.
8194 ! ier.gt.0 abnormal termination of the routine. it is
8195 ! assumed that the requested accuracy has
8196 ! not been achieved.
8197 ! error messages
8198 ! ier = 1 the maximum number of steps has been
8199 ! executed. the integral is probably too
8200 ! difficult to be calculated by dqng.
8201 ! = 6 the input is invalid, because
8202 ! epsabs.le.0 and
8203 ! epsrel.lt.max(50*rel.mach.acc.,0.5d-28).
8204 ! result, abserr and neval are set to zero.
8205 !
8206 ! Local Parameters:
8207 !
8208 ! the data statements contain the
8209 ! abscissae and weights of the integration rules used.
8210 !
8211 ! x1 abscissae common to the 10-, 21-, 43- and 87-
8212 ! point rule
8213 ! x2 abscissae common to the 21-, 43- and 87-point rule
8214 ! x3 abscissae common to the 43- and 87-point rule
8215 ! x4 abscissae of the 87-point rule
8216 ! w10 weights of the 10-point formula
8217 ! w21a weights of the 21-point formula for abscissae x1
8218 ! w21b weights of the 21-point formula for abscissae x2
8219 ! w43a weights of the 43-point formula for abscissae x1, x3
8220 ! w43b weights of the 43-point formula for abscissae x3
8221 ! w87a weights of the 87-point formula for abscissae x1,
8222 ! x2, x3
8223 ! w87b weights of the 87-point formula for abscissae x4
8224 !
8225 !
8226 ! gauss-kronrod-patterson quadrature coefficients for use in
8227 ! quadpack routine qng. these coefficients were calculated with
8228 ! 101 decimal digit arithmetic by l. w. fullerton, bell labs, nov 1981.
8229 !
8230 ! centr - mid point of the integration interval
8231 ! hlgth - half-length of the integration interval
8232 ! fcentr - function value at mid point
8233 ! absc - abscissa
8234 ! fval - function value
8235 ! savfun - array of function values which have already been
8236 ! computed
8237 ! res10 - 10-point gauss result
8238 ! res21 - 21-point kronrod result
8239 ! res43 - 43-point result
8240 ! res87 - 87-point result
8241 ! resabs - approximation to the integral of abs(f)
8242 ! resasc - approximation to the integral of abs(f-i/(b-a))
8243 !
8244 ! machine dependent constants
8245 !
8246 ! epmach is the largest relative spacing.
8247 ! uflow is the smallest positive magnitude.
8248 !
8249  implicit none
8250 
8251  real ( kind = 8 ) a,absc,abserr,b,centr,dhlgth, &
8252  epmach,epsabs,epsrel,f,fcentr,fval,fval1,fval2,fv1,fv2, &
8253  fv3,fv4,hlgth,result,res10,res21,res43,res87,resabs,resasc, &
8254  reskh,savfun,uflow,w10,w21a,w21b,w43a,w43b,w87a,w87b,x1,x2,x3,x4
8255  integer ( kind = 4 ) ier,ipx,k,l,neval
8256  external f
8257  dimension fv1(5),fv2(5),fv3(5),fv4(5),x1(5),x2(5),x3(11),x4(22), &
8258  w10(5),w21a(5),w21b(6),w43a(10),w43b(12),w87a(21),w87b(23), &
8259  savfun(21)
8260 
8261  data x1( 1) / 0.973906528517171720077964012084452d0 /
8262  data x1( 2) / 0.865063366688984510732096688423493d0 /
8263  data x1( 3) / 0.679409568299024406234327365114874d0 /
8264  data x1( 4) / 0.433395394129247190799265943165784d0 /
8265  data x1( 5) / 0.148874338981631210884826001129720d0 /
8266  data w10( 1) / 0.066671344308688137593568809893332d0 /
8267  data w10( 2) / 0.149451349150580593145776339657697d0 /
8268  data w10( 3) / 0.219086362515982043995534934228163d0 /
8269  data w10( 4) / 0.269266719309996355091226921569469d0 /
8270  data w10( 5) / 0.295524224714752870173892994651338d0 /
8271 
8272  data x2( 1) / 0.995657163025808080735527280689003d0 /
8273  data x2( 2) / 0.930157491355708226001207180059508d0 /
8274  data x2( 3) / 0.780817726586416897063717578345042d0 /
8275  data x2( 4) / 0.562757134668604683339000099272694d0 /
8276  data x2( 5) / 0.294392862701460198131126603103866d0 /
8277  data w21a( 1) / 0.032558162307964727478818972459390d0 /
8278  data w21a( 2) / 0.075039674810919952767043140916190d0 /
8279  data w21a( 3) / 0.109387158802297641899210590325805d0 /
8280  data w21a( 4) / 0.134709217311473325928054001771707d0 /
8281  data w21a( 5) / 0.147739104901338491374841515972068d0 /
8282  data w21b( 1) / 0.011694638867371874278064396062192d0 /
8283  data w21b( 2) / 0.054755896574351996031381300244580d0 /
8284  data w21b( 3) / 0.093125454583697605535065465083366d0 /
8285  data w21b( 4) / 0.123491976262065851077958109831074d0 /
8286  data w21b( 5) / 0.142775938577060080797094273138717d0 /
8287  data w21b( 6) / 0.149445554002916905664936468389821d0 /
8288 !
8289  data x3( 1) / 0.999333360901932081394099323919911d0 /
8290  data x3( 2) / 0.987433402908088869795961478381209d0 /
8291  data x3( 3) / 0.954807934814266299257919200290473d0 /
8292  data x3( 4) / 0.900148695748328293625099494069092d0 /
8293  data x3( 5) / 0.825198314983114150847066732588520d0 /
8294  data x3( 6) / 0.732148388989304982612354848755461d0 /
8295  data x3( 7) / 0.622847970537725238641159120344323d0 /
8296  data x3( 8) / 0.499479574071056499952214885499755d0 /
8297  data x3( 9) / 0.364901661346580768043989548502644d0 /
8298  data x3( 10) / 0.222254919776601296498260928066212d0 /
8299  data x3( 11) / 0.074650617461383322043914435796506d0 /
8300  data w43a( 1) / 0.016296734289666564924281974617663d0 /
8301  data w43a( 2) / 0.037522876120869501461613795898115d0 /
8302  data w43a( 3) / 0.054694902058255442147212685465005d0 /
8303  data w43a( 4) / 0.067355414609478086075553166302174d0 /
8304  data w43a( 5) / 0.073870199632393953432140695251367d0 /
8305  data w43a( 6) / 0.005768556059769796184184327908655d0 /
8306  data w43a( 7) / 0.027371890593248842081276069289151d0 /
8307  data w43a( 8) / 0.046560826910428830743339154433824d0 /
8308  data w43a( 9) / 0.061744995201442564496240336030883d0 /
8309  data w43a( 10) / 0.071387267268693397768559114425516d0 /
8310  data w43b( 1) / 0.001844477640212414100389106552965d0 /
8311  data w43b( 2) / 0.010798689585891651740465406741293d0 /
8312  data w43b( 3) / 0.021895363867795428102523123075149d0 /
8313  data w43b( 4) / 0.032597463975345689443882222526137d0 /
8314  data w43b( 5) / 0.042163137935191811847627924327955d0 /
8315  data w43b( 6) / 0.050741939600184577780189020092084d0 /
8316  data w43b( 7) / 0.058379395542619248375475369330206d0 /
8317  data w43b( 8) / 0.064746404951445885544689259517511d0 /
8318  data w43b( 9) / 0.069566197912356484528633315038405d0 /
8319  data w43b( 10) / 0.072824441471833208150939535192842d0 /
8320  data w43b( 11) / 0.074507751014175118273571813842889d0 /
8321  data w43b( 12) / 0.074722147517403005594425168280423d0 /
8322 
8323  data x4( 1) / 0.999902977262729234490529830591582d0 /
8324  data x4( 2) / 0.997989895986678745427496322365960d0 /
8325  data x4( 3) / 0.992175497860687222808523352251425d0 /
8326  data x4( 4) / 0.981358163572712773571916941623894d0 /
8327  data x4( 5) / 0.965057623858384619128284110607926d0 /
8328  data x4( 6) / 0.943167613133670596816416634507426d0 /
8329  data x4( 7) / 0.915806414685507209591826430720050d0 /
8330  data x4( 8) / 0.883221657771316501372117548744163d0 /
8331  data x4( 9) / 0.845710748462415666605902011504855d0 /
8332  data x4( 10) / 0.803557658035230982788739474980964d0 /
8333  data x4( 11) / 0.757005730685495558328942793432020d0 /
8334  data x4( 12) / 0.706273209787321819824094274740840d0 /
8335  data x4( 13) / 0.651589466501177922534422205016736d0 /
8336  data x4( 14) / 0.593223374057961088875273770349144d0 /
8337  data x4( 15) / 0.531493605970831932285268948562671d0 /
8338  data x4( 16) / 0.466763623042022844871966781659270d0 /
8339  data x4( 17) / 0.399424847859218804732101665817923d0 /
8340  data x4( 18) / 0.329874877106188288265053371824597d0 /
8341  data x4( 19) / 0.258503559202161551802280975429025d0 /
8342  data x4( 20) / 0.185695396568346652015917141167606d0 /
8343  data x4( 21) / 0.111842213179907468172398359241362d0 /
8344  data x4( 22) / 0.037352123394619870814998165437704d0 /
8345  data w87a( 1) / 0.008148377384149172900002878448190d0 /
8346  data w87a( 2) / 0.018761438201562822243935059003794d0 /
8347  data w87a( 3) / 0.027347451050052286161582829741283d0 /
8348  data w87a( 4) / 0.033677707311637930046581056957588d0 /
8349  data w87a( 5) / 0.036935099820427907614589586742499d0 /
8350  data w87a( 6) / 0.002884872430211530501334156248695d0 /
8351  data w87a( 7) / 0.013685946022712701888950035273128d0 /
8352  data w87a( 8) / 0.023280413502888311123409291030404d0 /
8353  data w87a( 9) / 0.030872497611713358675466394126442d0 /
8354  data w87a( 10) / 0.035693633639418770719351355457044d0 /
8355  data w87a( 11) / 0.000915283345202241360843392549948d0 /
8356  data w87a( 12) / 0.005399280219300471367738743391053d0 /
8357  data w87a( 13) / 0.010947679601118931134327826856808d0 /
8358  data w87a( 14) / 0.016298731696787335262665703223280d0 /
8359  data w87a( 15) / 0.021081568889203835112433060188190d0 /
8360  data w87a( 16) / 0.025370969769253827243467999831710d0 /
8361  data w87a( 17) / 0.029189697756475752501446154084920d0 /
8362  data w87a( 18) / 0.032373202467202789685788194889595d0 /
8363  data w87a( 19) / 0.034783098950365142750781997949596d0 /
8364  data w87a( 20) / 0.036412220731351787562801163687577d0 /
8365  data w87a( 21) / 0.037253875503047708539592001191226d0 /
8366  data w87b( 1) / 0.000274145563762072350016527092881d0 /
8367  data w87b( 2) / 0.001807124155057942948341311753254d0 /
8368  data w87b( 3) / 0.004096869282759164864458070683480d0 /
8369  data w87b( 4) / 0.006758290051847378699816577897424d0 /
8370  data w87b( 5) / 0.009549957672201646536053581325377d0 /
8371  data w87b( 6) / 0.012329447652244853694626639963780d0 /
8372  data w87b( 7) / 0.015010447346388952376697286041943d0 /
8373  data w87b( 8) / 0.017548967986243191099665352925900d0 /
8374  data w87b( 9) / 0.019938037786440888202278192730714d0 /
8375  data w87b( 10) / 0.022194935961012286796332102959499d0 /
8376  data w87b( 11) / 0.024339147126000805470360647041454d0 /
8377  data w87b( 12) / 0.026374505414839207241503786552615d0 /
8378  data w87b( 13) / 0.028286910788771200659968002987960d0 /
8379  data w87b( 14) / 0.030052581128092695322521110347341d0 /
8380  data w87b( 15) / 0.031646751371439929404586051078883d0 /
8381  data w87b( 16) / 0.033050413419978503290785944862689d0 /
8382  data w87b( 17) / 0.034255099704226061787082821046821d0 /
8383  data w87b( 18) / 0.035262412660156681033782717998428d0 /
8384  data w87b( 19) / 0.036076989622888701185500318003895d0 /
8385  data w87b( 20) / 0.036698604498456094498018047441094d0 /
8386  data w87b( 21) / 0.037120549269832576114119958413599d0 /
8387  data w87b( 22) / 0.037334228751935040321235449094698d0 /
8388  data w87b( 23) / 0.037361073762679023410321241766599d0 /
8389 
8390  epmach = epsilon( epmach )
8391  uflow = tiny( uflow )
8392 !
8393 ! test on validity of parameters
8394 !
8395  result = 0.0d+00
8396  abserr = 0.0d+00
8397  neval = 0
8398  ier = 6
8399  if(epsabs.le.0.0d+00.and.epsrel.lt. max( 0.5d+02*epmach,0.5d-28)) &
8400  go to 80
8401  hlgth = 0.5d+00*(b-a)
8402  dhlgth = abs( hlgth)
8403  centr = 0.5d+00*(b+a)
8404  fcentr = f(centr)
8405  neval = 21
8406  ier = 1
8407 !
8408 ! compute the integral using the 10- and 21-point formula.
8409 !
8410  do 70 l = 1,3
8411 
8412  go to (5,25,45),l
8413 
8414  5 res10 = 0.0d+00
8415  res21 = w21b(6)*fcentr
8416  resabs = w21b(6)* abs( fcentr)
8417 
8418  do k=1,5
8419  absc = hlgth*x1(k)
8420  fval1 = f(centr+absc)
8421  fval2 = f(centr-absc)
8422  fval = fval1+fval2
8423  res10 = res10+w10(k)*fval
8424  res21 = res21+w21a(k)*fval
8425  resabs = resabs+w21a(k)*( abs( fval1)+ abs( fval2))
8426  savfun(k) = fval
8427  fv1(k) = fval1
8428  fv2(k) = fval2
8429  end do
8430 
8431  ipx = 5
8432 
8433  do k=1,5
8434  ipx = ipx+1
8435  absc = hlgth*x2(k)
8436  fval1 = f(centr+absc)
8437  fval2 = f(centr-absc)
8438  fval = fval1+fval2
8439  res21 = res21+w21b(k)*fval
8440  resabs = resabs+w21b(k)*( abs( fval1)+ abs( fval2))
8441  savfun(ipx) = fval
8442  fv3(k) = fval1
8443  fv4(k) = fval2
8444  end do
8445 !
8446 ! test for convergence.
8447 !
8448  result = res21*hlgth
8449  resabs = resabs*dhlgth
8450  reskh = 0.5d+00*res21
8451  resasc = w21b(6)* abs( fcentr-reskh)
8452 
8453  do k = 1,5
8454  resasc = resasc+w21a(k)*( abs( fv1(k)-reskh)+ abs( fv2(k)-reskh)) &
8455  +w21b(k)*( abs( fv3(k)-reskh)+ abs( fv4(k)-reskh))
8456  end do
8457 
8458  abserr = abs( (res21-res10)*hlgth)
8459  resasc = resasc*dhlgth
8460  go to 65
8461 !
8462 ! compute the integral using the 43-point formula.
8463 !
8464 25 res43 = w43b(12)*fcentr
8465  neval = 43
8466 
8467  do k=1,10
8468  res43 = res43+savfun(k)*w43a(k)
8469  end do
8470 
8471  do k=1,11
8472  ipx = ipx+1
8473  absc = hlgth*x3(k)
8474  fval = f(absc+centr)+f(centr-absc)
8475  res43 = res43+fval*w43b(k)
8476  savfun(ipx) = fval
8477  end do
8478 !
8479 ! test for convergence.
8480 !
8481  result = res43*hlgth
8482  abserr = abs( (res43-res21)*hlgth)
8483  go to 65
8484 !
8485 ! compute the integral using the 87-point formula.
8486 !
8487 45 res87 = w87b(23)*fcentr
8488  neval = 87
8489 
8490  do k=1,21
8491  res87 = res87+savfun(k)*w87a(k)
8492  end do
8493 
8494  do k=1,22
8495  absc = hlgth*x4(k)
8496  res87 = res87+w87b(k)*(f(absc+centr)+f(centr-absc))
8497  end do
8498 
8499  result = res87*hlgth
8500  abserr = abs( (res87-res43)*hlgth)
8501 
8502 65 continue
8503 
8504  if(resasc.ne.0.0d+00.and.abserr.ne.0.0d+00) then
8505  abserr = resasc* min(0.1d+01,(0.2d+03*abserr/resasc)**1.5d+00)
8506  end if
8507 
8508  if (resabs.gt.uflow/(0.5d+02*epmach)) then
8509  abserr = max((epmach*0.5d+02)*resabs,abserr)
8510  end if
8511 
8512  if (abserr.le. max( epsabs,epsrel* abs( result))) then
8513  ier = 0
8514  return
8515  end if
8516 
8517 70 continue
8518 
8519  80 call xerror('abnormal return from dqng ',26,ier,0)
8520  999 continue
8521 
8522  return
8523 end
8524 subroutine dqpsrt ( limit, last, maxerr, ermax, elist, iord, nrmax )
8525 
8526 !*****************************************************************************80
8527 !
8528 !! DQPSRT maintains the order of a list of local error estimates.
8529 !
8530 ! Modified:
8531 !
8532 ! 11 September 2015
8533 !
8534 ! Author:
8535 !
8536 ! Robert Piessens, Elise de Doncker
8537 !
8538 !***purpose this routine maintains the descending ordering in the
8539 ! list of the local error estimated resulting from the
8540 ! interval subdivision process. at each call two error
8541 ! estimates are inserted using the sequential search
8542 ! method, top-down for the largest error estimate and
8543 ! bottom-up for the smallest error estimate.
8544 !
8545 ! Parameters:
8546 !
8547 ! limit - integer ( kind = 4 )
8548 ! maximum number of error estimates the list
8549 ! can contain
8550 !
8551 ! last - integer ( kind = 4 )
8552 ! number of error estimates currently in the list
8553 !
8554 ! maxerr - integer ( kind = 4 )
8555 ! maxerr points to the nrmax-th largest error
8556 ! estimate currently in the list
8557 !
8558 ! ermax - real ( kind = 8 )
8559 ! nrmax-th largest error estimate
8560 ! ermax = elist(maxerr)
8561 !
8562 ! elist - real ( kind = 8 )
8563 ! vector of dimension last containing
8564 ! the error estimates
8565 !
8566 ! iord - integer ( kind = 4 )
8567 ! vector of dimension last, the first k elements
8568 ! of which contain pointers to the error
8569 ! estimates, such that
8570 ! elist(iord(1)),..., elist(iord(k))
8571 ! form a decreasing sequence, with
8572 ! k = last if last.le.(limit/2+2), and
8573 ! k = limit+1-last otherwise
8574 !
8575 ! nrmax - integer ( kind = 4 )
8576 ! maxerr = iord(nrmax)
8577 !
8578  implicit none
8579 
8580  real ( kind = 8 ) elist,ermax,errmax,errmin
8581  integer ( kind = 4 ) i,ibeg,ido,iord,isucc,j,jbnd,jupbn,k,last, &
8582  lim
8583  integer ( kind = 4 ) limit
8584  integer ( kind = 4 ) maxerr
8585  integer ( kind = 4 ) nrmax
8586  dimension elist(last),iord(last)
8587 !
8588 ! check whether the list contains more than
8589 ! two error estimates.
8590 !
8591  if(last.gt.2) go to 10
8592  iord(1) = 1
8593  iord(2) = 2
8594  go to 90
8595 !
8596 ! this part of the routine is only executed if, due to a
8597 ! difficult integrand, subdivision increased the error
8598 ! estimate. in the normal case the insert procedure should
8599 ! start after the nrmax-th largest error estimate.
8600 !
8601  10 errmax = elist(maxerr)
8602 
8603  ido = nrmax-1
8604  do i = 1,ido
8605  isucc = iord(nrmax-1)
8606  if(errmax.le.elist(isucc)) go to 30
8607  iord(nrmax) = isucc
8608  nrmax = nrmax-1
8609  end do
8610 !
8611 ! compute the number of elements in the list to be maintained
8612 ! in descending order. this number depends on the number of
8613 ! subdivisions still allowed.
8614 !
8615  30 jupbn = last
8616  if(last.gt.(limit/2+2)) jupbn = limit+3-last
8617  errmin = elist(last)
8618 !
8619 ! insert errmax by traversing the list top-down,
8620 ! starting comparison from the element elist(iord(nrmax+1)).
8621 !
8622  jbnd = jupbn-1
8623  ibeg = nrmax+1
8624 
8625  do i=ibeg,jbnd
8626  isucc = iord(i)
8627  if(errmax.ge.elist(isucc)) go to 60
8628  iord(i-1) = isucc
8629  end do
8630 
8631  iord(jbnd) = maxerr
8632  iord(jupbn) = last
8633  go to 90
8634 !
8635 ! insert errmin by traversing the list bottom-up.
8636 !
8637  60 iord(i-1) = maxerr
8638  k = jbnd
8639 
8640  do j=i,jbnd
8641  isucc = iord(k)
8642  if(errmin.lt.elist(isucc)) go to 80
8643  iord(k+1) = isucc
8644  k = k-1
8645  end do
8646 
8647  iord(i) = last
8648  go to 90
8649  80 iord(k+1) = last
8650 !
8651 ! set maxerr and ermax.
8652 !
8653  90 maxerr = iord(nrmax)
8654  ermax = elist(maxerr)
8655 
8656  return
8657 end
8658 function dqwgtc ( x, c, p2, p3, p4, kp )
8659 
8660 !*****************************************************************************80
8661 !
8662 !! DQWGTC defines the weight function used by DQC25C.
8663 !
8664 ! Modified:
8665 !
8666 ! 11 September 2015
8667 !
8668 ! Author:
8669 !
8670 ! Robert Piessens, Elise de Doncker
8671 !
8672  implicit none
8673 
8674  real ( kind = 8 ) dqwgtc
8675  real ( kind = 8 ) c,p2,p3,p4,x
8676  integer ( kind = 4 ) kp
8677 
8678  dqwgtc = 0.1d+01 / ( x - c )
8679 
8680  return
8681 end
8682 function dqwgtf(x,omega,p2,p3,p4,integr)
8683 
8684 !*****************************************************************************80
8685 !
8686 !! DQWGTF defines the weight functions used by DQC25F.
8687 !
8688 ! Modified:
8689 !
8690 ! 11 September 2015
8691 !
8692 ! Author:
8693 !
8694 ! Robert Piessens, Elise de Doncker
8695 !
8696  implicit none
8697 
8698  real ( kind = 8 ) dqwgtf
8699  real ( kind = 8 ) dcos,dsin,omega,omx,p2,p3,p4,x
8700  integer ( kind = 4 ) integr
8701 
8702  omx = omega * x
8703 
8704  if ( integr == 1 ) then
8705  dqwgtf = cos( omx )
8706  else
8707  dqwgtf = sin( omx )
8708  end if
8709 
8710  return
8711 end
8712 function dqwgts ( x, a, b, alfa, beta, integr )
8713 
8714 !*****************************************************************************80
8715 !
8716 !! DQWGTS defines the weight functions used by DQC25S.
8717 !
8718 ! Modified:
8719 !
8720 ! 11 September 2015
8721 !
8722 ! Author:
8723 !
8724 ! Robert Piessens, Elise de Doncker
8725 !
8726  implicit none
8727 
8728  real dqwgts
8729  real ( kind = 8 ) a,alfa,b,beta,bmx,x,xma
8730  integer ( kind = 4 ) integr
8731 
8732  xma = x - a
8733  bmx = b - x
8734  dqwgts = xma ** alfa * bmx ** beta
8735  go to (40,10,20,30),integr
8736  10 dqwgts = dqwgts* log( xma )
8737  go to 40
8738  20 dqwgts = dqwgts* log( bmx )
8739  go to 40
8740  30 dqwgts = dqwgts* log( xma ) * log( bmx )
8741  40 continue
8742 
8743  return
8744 end
8745 subroutine timestamp ( )
8746 
8747 !*****************************************************************************80
8748 !
8749 !! TIMESTAMP prints the current YMDHMS date as a time stamp.
8750 !
8751 ! Example:
8752 !
8753 ! 31 May 2001 9:45:54.872 AM
8754 !
8755 ! Licensing:
8756 !
8757 ! This code is distributed under the GNU LGPL license.
8758 !
8759 ! Modified:
8760 !
8761 ! 18 May 2013
8762 !
8763 ! Author:
8764 !
8765 ! John Burkardt
8766 !
8767 ! Parameters:
8768 !
8769 ! None
8770 !
8771  implicit none
8772 
8773  character ( len = 8 ) ampm
8774  integer ( kind = 4 ) d
8775  integer ( kind = 4 ) h
8776  integer ( kind = 4 ) m
8777  integer ( kind = 4 ) mm
8778  character ( len = 9 ), parameter, dimension(12) :: month = (/ &
8779  'January ', 'February ', 'March ', 'April ', &
8780  'May ', 'June ', 'July ', 'August ', &
8781  'September', 'October ', 'November ', 'December ' /)
8782  integer ( kind = 4 ) n
8783  integer ( kind = 4 ) s
8784  integer ( kind = 4 ) values(8)
8785  integer ( kind = 4 ) y
8786 
8787  call date_and_time ( values = values )
8788 
8789  y = values(1)
8790  m = values(2)
8791  d = values(3)
8792  h = values(5)
8793  n = values(6)
8794  s = values(7)
8795  mm = values(8)
8796 
8797  if ( h < 12 ) then
8798  ampm = 'AM'
8799  else if ( h == 12 ) then
8800  if ( n == 0 .and. s == 0 ) then
8801  ampm = 'Noon'
8802  else
8803  ampm = 'PM'
8804  end if
8805  else
8806  h = h - 12
8807  if ( h < 12 ) then
8808  ampm = 'PM'
8809  else if ( h == 12 ) then
8810  if ( n == 0 .and. s == 0 ) then
8811  ampm = 'Midnight'
8812  else
8813  ampm = 'AM'
8814  end if
8815  end if
8816  end if
8817 
8818  write ( *, '(i2.2,1x,a,1x,i4,2x,i2,a1,i2.2,a1,i2.2,a1,i3.3,1x,a)' ) &
8819  d, trim( month(m) ), y, h, ':', n, ':', s, '.', mm, trim( ampm )
8820 
8821  return
8822 end
8823 subroutine xerror ( xmess, nmess, nerr, level )
8824 
8825 !*****************************************************************************80
8826 !
8827 !! XERROR replaces the SLATEC XERROR routine.
8828 !
8829 ! Modified:
8830 !
8831 ! 12 September 2015
8832 !
8833  implicit none
8834 
8835  integer ( kind = 4 ) level
8836  integer ( kind = 4 ) nerr
8837  integer ( kind = 4 ) nmess
8838  character ( len = * ) xmess
8839 
8840  if ( 1 <= level ) then
8841  WRITE ( *,'(1X,A)') xmess(1:nmess)
8842  WRITE ( *,'('' ERROR NUMBER = '',I5,'', MESSAGE LEVEL = '',I5)') &
8843  nerr,level
8844  end if
8845 
8846  return
8847 end
8848 
dqag
subroutine dqag(f, a, b, epsabs, epsrel, key, result, abserr, neval, ier, limit, lenw, last, iwork, work)
Definition: quadpack_double.f90:515
dqawf

timestamp
subroutine timestamp()
Definition: quadpack_double.f90:8746
dqaws
subroutine dqaws(f, a, b, alfa, beta, integr, epsabs, epsrel, result, abserr, neval, ier, limit, lenw, last, iwork, work)
Definition: quadpack_double.f90:5012
